projects.title: Walze
projects.project_description: WALZE is an audiovisual sequencer, which maps midi-patterns on circular paths as a visual analogy to sound-loops. Circles can be nested into each other to create polyrythmics und complex sound structures. </br> The smart circle-interface is used as visual projection at the same time. The audience experiences visuals which are not only matching the music, but actually creating it.
